suppress.notes: file name: AppleJavaExtensions-1.4.jar we are onl latest version. fixes not available yet.
file name: dom4j-2.1.1.jar we are on latest version. fixes not available yet.

CVE-2018-1258: we do not use Spring Method Security, so this does not affect us. see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258. However if we still want to get rid of this vulnerability, it would need a spring boot version upgrade.
